metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9721 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
libzmq before 4.0.6 and 4.1.x before 4.1.1 allows remote attackers toconduct downgrade attacks and bypass ZMTP v3 protocol security mechanismsvia a ZMTP v2 or earlier header.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9721` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzmq3 - 4.0.5+dfsg-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zeromq3 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.5+dfsg-3').
